attributes.action: remove the lords spiritual from the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religion no longer has a place in modern society, and most certainly not at its head. It cannot be right that unelected, non-secular figures are allowed to vote on key issues that representatives of the public should instead be deciding on. It is not right that we should have religious figures in such prominent positions and their powers related to the law should be removed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
